data.title: NBA Summer League rosters 2024: Here's the full list of players for each team in Las Vegas
data.meta_description: Here are the full rosters for all 30 teams taking the floor in Vegas.
data.text:
The NBA 2K25 Summer League is upon us.

For the 20th year, the NBA's premier summer event will be held on the campus of UNLV in Las Vegas. Beginning on July 12, all 30 NBA teams will converge in Sin City for the event that showcases the game's next stars and players grinding to earn a place in the league.

Who will suit up at this year's Summer League? Here are the full rosters for all 30 teams taking the floor in Vegas. Click down to jump to a specific team's roster.

NBA SUMMER LEAGUE ROSTERS:

Hawks | Celtics | Nets | Hornets | Bulls

Cavaliers | Mavericks | Nuggets | Pistons | Warriors

Rockets | Pacers | Clippers | Lakers | Grizzlies

Heat | Bucks | Timberwolves | Pelicans | Knicks

Thunder | Magic | 76ers | Suns | Trail Blazers

Kings | Spurs | Raptors | Jazz | Wizards
